Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.modele.formeTapis

Class FormeTriangle

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.modele.formeTapis.FormeTapis
fr.utt.lo02.projet.modele.formeTapis.FormeTriangle
public class FormeTriangle
extends FormeTapis
Triangle layout of the cards. In this class, it can be judged whether operations such as placing cards or moving cards conform to the shape of the layout.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Fulin and Dewen

    • peutEtrePlacer

      public boolean peutEtrePlacer​(int point, Carte carte, java.lang.String direction)
      Determine whether cards can be placed in a direction selected under the condition of triangular layout.
      Specified by:
      peutEtrePlacer in class FormeTapis
      Parameters:
      point - The position of the selected card (place carteMain around this card)
      carte - Cards to be placed
      direction - Placement direction
      Returns:
      true if it conforms to the triangle layout after placing the card

    • estTriangle

      public boolean estTriangle()
      Determine whether it matches one of the four triangles

      Because the final layout of the cards is triangular and there are only four possible positions for the triangle, lower left, upper left, upper right or lower right. Therefore, we only need to determine whether the current layout matches one of them. 1. Put the cards first. 2. Move all the cards to the lower left corner, and judge whether it matches after moving the card; if it matches, return true; otherwise, step 3. 3. Move to the upper left corner. 4. Move to the upper right corner. 5. Move to the lower right corner.

      Returns:
      true if it matches one of the four triangles

    • lengthThisLigne

      public java.lang.Integer[] lengthThisLigne​(int i)
      Determine the length of the input line
      Parameters:
      i - The number of line
      Returns:
      Integer[0] Largest abscissa, Integer[1] Smallest abscissa
